name.description: Give a name to this configuration so it can be later referenced by config-ref.
name.caption: Name
name.name: name

string.description: The main AMQP broker host to connect to
string.caption: Host
string.name: host

integer.description: The port to use to connect to the main AMQP broker
integer.caption: Port
integer.name: port

string.description: The password to use to connect to the AMQP broker
string.caption: Password
string.name: password

string.description: The user name to use to connect to the AMQP broker
string.caption: Username
string.name: username

string.description: The virtual host to connect to on the AMQP broker
string.caption: Virtual Host
string.name: virtualHost

string.description: Reference to an endpoint to which AMQP returned message should be dispatched to
string.caption: Default Return Listener Reference
string.name: defaultReturnListener-ref

string.description: Reference to an endpoint builder to which be used to get the return listener endpoint
string.caption: Default Return Endpoint Builder Reference
string.name: defaultReturnEndpointBuilder-ref

string.description: The priority to use when publishing to the AMQP broker
string.caption: Priority
string.name: priority

integer.description: The maximum number of messages that the server will deliver, 0 if unlimited
integer.caption: Prefetch Count
integer.name: prefetchCount

integer.description: The maximum amount of content (measured in octets) that the server will deliver, 0 if unlimited
integer.caption: Prefetch Size
integer.name: prefetchSize

enum.description: The acknowledgment mode to use when consuming from the AMQP broker
enum.caption: Ack Mode
enum.name: ackMode

enum.description: The delivery mode to use when publishing to the AMQP broker
enum.caption: Delivery Mode
enum.name: deliveryMode

boolean.description: Defines if the connector should only do active exchange and queue declarations or can also perform passive declarations to enforce their existence
boolean.caption: Active Declarations Only
boolean.name: activeDeclarationsOnly

boolean.description: Set to true if the connector should only create exclusive consumers
boolean.caption: Exclusive Consumers
boolean.name: exclusiveConsumers

boolean.description: This flag tells the server how to react if the message cannot be routed to a queue consumer immediately. If this flag is set to true, the server will throw an exception for any undeliverable message. If this flag is false, the server will queue the message, but with no guarantee that it will ever be consumed
boolean.caption: Immediate
boolean.name: immediate

boolean.description: This flag tells the server how to react if the message cannot be routed to a queue. If this flag is set to true, the server will throw an exception for any unroutable message. If this flag is false, the server silently drops the message
boolean.caption: Mandatory
boolean.name: mandatory

boolean.description: If the no-local field is set the server will not send messages to the connection that published them
boolean.caption: No Local
boolean.name: noLocal

element-controller-list.description: A comma-separated list of "host:port" or "host", defining fallback brokers to attempt connection to, should the connection to main broker fail
element-controller-list.caption: Fallback Addresses

endpoint.caption: AMQP Endpoint
endpoint.description: The AMQP Endpoint allows Mule applications to send or receive messages to an AMQP Broker

string.name: exchangeName
string.caption: Exchange Name
string.description: The exchange to publish to or bind queues to. Leave blank or omit for the default exchange

string.name: queueName
string.caption: Queue Name
string.description: The queue name to consume from. Leave blank or omit for using a new private exclusive server-named queue

string.name: routingKey
string.caption: Routing Key
string.description: The routing key to use when binding a queue or publishing a message

string.name: consumerTag
string.caption: Consumer Tag
string.description: A client-generated consumer tag to establish context

enum.name: exchangeType
enum.caption: Exchange Type
enum.description: The type of exchange to be declared

boolean.name: exchangeDurable
boolean.caption: Exchange Durable
boolean.description: The durability of the declared exchange

boolean.name: exchangeAutoDelete
boolean.caption: Exchange Auto Delete
boolean.description: Specifies if the declared exchange should be autodeleted

boolean.name: queueDurable
boolean.caption: Queue Durable
boolean.description: Specifies if the declared queue is durable

boolean.name: queueAutoDelete
boolean.caption: Queue Auto Delete
boolean.description: Specifies if the declared queue should be autodeleted

boolean.name: queueExclusive
boolean.caption: Queue Exclusive
boolean.description: Specifies if the declared queue is exclusive

global-endpoint.caption: HL7 MLLP
global-endpoint.description: The HL7 Endpoint allows Mule applications to send or receive messages over HL7/MLLP connections.
